page.title: 13TRAFFIC SURVEY-NORRISTHORPE
page.content: A survey, lasting{one hour,}was conducted on the following types of road:- A.{TRUNK ROAD}(A62-Leeds/Huddersfield) B.{SMALL TOWN}(Norristhorpe Lane - {BY-PASS }Heckmondwike By-pass) C.{VILLAGE ROAD}(Liversedge Hall Lane) ______________________________________ {ROAD USER A B C TOTAL ______________________________________ Cars 1283 190 78 1551 Lorries 360 20 11 391 Vans 306 40 28 374 Buses/Coaches 24 4 6 34 Motor Cycles 9 2 6 17 Bicycles 9 0 6 15 Tractors 0 0 3 3 Horses 0 0 4 4 Pedestrians 60 112 21 193 -------------------------------------- {TOTAL 2051 368 163 2582 --------------------------------------
